.. _young_association:

Young association
-----------------

To test the :ref:`Priors` in the specific case of a young, we simulated 100 objects. The distances were drawn from a Gaussian distribution with mean at :math:`\mu=100` pc, and standard deviation :math:`\sigma=10` pc.

	.. _association_uniform_5:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/Uniform/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Uniform prior with scale 500 pc.


	.. _association_gaussian_1:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/Gaussian/1/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Gaussian prior with scale :math:`1\sigma`.


	.. _association_gaussian_5:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/Gaussian/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Gaussian prior with scale :math:`5\sigma`.

	.. _association_gaussian_10:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/Gaussian/10/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Gaussian prior with scale :math:`10\sigma`.


	.. _association_cauchy_1:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/Cauchy/1/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Cauchy prior with scale :math:`1\sigma`.


	.. _association_cauchy_5:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/Cauchy/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Cauchy prior with scale :math:`5\sigma`.

	.. _association_cauchy_10:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/Cauchy/10/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Cauchy prior with scale :math:`10\sigma`.


	.. .. _association_EDBJ2015_1:

	.. .. figure:: images/Association_like/EDBJ2015/1/Errors.*
	.. 	:align: left

	.. 	Relative errors obtained using a EDBJ2015 prior with scale :math:`1\sigma`.


	.. _association_EDBJ2015_5:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/EDBJ2015/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a EDBJ2015 prior with scale :math:`5\sigma`.

	.. _association_EDBJ2015_10:

	.. figure:: images/Association_like/EDBJ2015/10/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a EDBJ2015 prior with scale :math:`10\sigma`.
